attributes.action: reduce fares on transport (buses) in Bristol, as they are currently far too expensive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The fares for traveling in Bristol on buses are extremely high - It works out cheaper to buy a day ticket than to purchase a single or return bus ticket. If the prices of the fares are lowered considerably, it will move people out of their cars and onto buses which will benefit the environment and the public transport services in the city.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
